title: Dietary jack bean (Canavalia ensiformis L.) supplementation enhanced intestinal health by modulating intestinal integrity and immune responses of broiler chickens
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Abd Majid Ahmad Madani, Muhlisin Muhlisin, Asih Kurniawati, Aji Praba Baskara, Muhsin Al Anas
